description: Complete system overview documenting the core architecture, key components, and high-level workflow of the governance platform with World ID integration
Detailed documentation of the voting system including proposal status determination algorithm, vote parameter construction, World ID verification flow, and on-chain submission process
Documentation of core data models including proposals, votes, user preferences, and their relationships, along with data transformation and formatting logic
Comprehensive documentation of the custom wallet-based authentication system including nonce generation, signature verification, and session management
Documentation of the DAO Node Client implementation including proposal/voter data fetching, caching mechanisms, and data transformation functions
